timeline.body:
Advantage of Junit5 and package-private as default is, that you don't have to write 'public' anymore... you benefit from writing less :-)
So with an IDE you can keep the auto-generated "public" modifier.
Changing every public method to "default", just increases the LoC to be checked for the PR.

I would recommend, changing only the modifier of classes/methods you actually have worked on, to keep PR simple :-)

I think it would be better if you stick to one style... Either 
`assertThatThrownBy(() -> TASK_SERVICE.claim("TKI:000000000000000000000000000000000035")).isInstanceOf(InvalidOwnerException.class);`
or
`
ThrowingCallable call =() -> TASK_SERVICE.forceCancelClaim("TKI:000000000000000000000000000000000036");
assertThatThrownBy(call).isInstanceOf(InvalidStateException.class);
`
